special_text:
[+1]: Rowan, Heir to Glory deals 3 damage to target player, planeswalker, or tapped creature.
[-1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Spell you cast this way cost {1} less to cast.
[-8]: You may cast any number of instant or sorcery spells from your hand and/or graveyard without paying their mana costs.
